'''Coreweb''', also known as '''coreweb GmbH''', is a German {{w|Software development|software development}} company based in {{w|Pfarrkirchen|Pfarrkirchen, Germany}}.<ref>{{cite
|url=https://de.linkedin.com/company/coreweb-gesellschaft-f%C3%BCr-consumer-relevant-web-solutions-mbh|title=coreweb GmBH|website=LinkedIn}}</ref> It is responsible for the development of the [[Movie:Oreo x A Minecraft Movie Experience|''Oreo x A Minecraft Experience'']] video game.<ref>The [https://www.taste-play-win.oreo.eu/ home page] of the original website that hosted the video game has the Coreweb logo in the top right corner.</ref>

== Games developed ==
Coreweb GmbH has developed and published one {{w|Augmented reality|augmented reality}} videogame, [[Movie:Oreo x A Minecraft Movie Experience|''Oreo x A Minecraft Experience'']], through collaboration between [[Movie:Oreo|''A Minecraft Movie'' and Oreo]].{{better source needed}}
